data.title: Identity and Access Management (IAM)
data.meta_description: Oracle identity and access management solutions secure access to enterprise applications for both cloud and on-premises deployments.
data.text:
Powerful and flexible capabilities for identity management

Oracle Identity and Access Management Suite 12c is highly customizable and can be deployed as software on-premises or as an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) instance. It enables secure access for employees, contractors, partners, and customers, allowing companies to deploy workloads on their infrastructure provider of choice while enabling all modes of access. Customers can extend their capabilities in the cloud with the cloud-native service, Oracle Access Governance, to run periodic reviews and access reviews.

Learn more about Oracle Access Governance

Learn what KuppingerCole says about Oracle’s identity strategy (PDF)

May 13, 2024

Introducing Oracle Universal Authenticator for secure and seamless access

Pavana Jain, Vice President, Product Management

Edward Lu, Senior Principal Product Manager

We’re excited to announce that Oracle Universal Authenticator is now generally available. It’s the latest addition to our Identity and Access Management microservices portfolio. In today's digital landscape, businesses face the challenge of defending against evolving threats while ensuring a seamless user access experience from various devices. Oracle Universal Authenticator makes this possible by providing single sign-on (SSO) with multifactor authentication and passwordless authentication options. It’s designed for both modern and legacy systems, and it simplifies the SSO experience.
